name: sweetheart market bag
notes:
this sweetheart market bag crochet pattern is so easy! welcome to week one of the marvellous market bag crochet along! this bag is made using only three crochet stitches: chain stitches, single crochet and double crochet stitches.  it is so easy! as is the case with all the market bags in this crochet along, this bag is worked from the bottom up and all as one piece.

the bag is named after the heart shape that is worked using a filet crochet technique (a grid-like pattern where certain blocks are filled in to create a picture or image).

this crochet pattern is written in english only and in american crochet terms.

a free written copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported website: https://richtexturescrochet.com

a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/richtexturescrochet/

skill level: easy

gauge:  17 sts x 9 rows of dc = 4 inches

finished size: approximately 13 x 20 inches excluding the handles

yarn: 24/7 cotton by lion brand® (186 yds/170 m; 100g/3.5 oz; 100% cotton; (4) worsted weight).  you will need 2 balls denim

 hook: size g/6 (4 mm) hook. 

notions: yarn needle
